terrain_segmentation.description: The inverse of 'water scale' in the map generator GUI.

water.description:
The equivalent to 'water coverage' in the map generator GUI. Higher coverage means more water in larger oceans.
Water level = 10 * log2(this value)

width.description: Width of map, in tiles; 0 means infinite

height.description: Height of map, in tiles; 0 means infinite

cliff_elevation_0.description: Elevation of first row of cliffs

cliff_elevation_interval.description: Elevation difference between successive rows of cliffs

richness.description: Multiplier for cliff continuity; 0 will result in no cliffs, 10 will make all cliff rows completely solid

property_expression_names.description:
Overrides for property value generators
Elevation influences water and cliff placement.
Leave it blank to get 'normal' terrain.
Use '0_16-elevation' to reproduce terrain from 0.16.
Use '0_17-island' to get an island.

seed.description: Use null for a random seed, number for a specific seed.
